metadata.title: CVE-2022-34033 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
HTMLDoc v1.9.15 was discovered to contain a heap overflow via(write_header) /htmldoc/htmldoc/html.cxx:273.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34033` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.16-1
htmldoc-common - 1.9.16-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.16-1').
